name: Landing at Zurich | Swiss (Helvetic) Fokker 100
description:
Onboard Helvetic Airways Fokker 100 HB-JVG in seat 13A for landing on runway 14 at Zurich after our flight as LX423 from Birmingham.  The video begins as the flaps are being deployed, just as we commence our ILS approach on a windy, rainy day in Switzerland.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y

✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈
